author: Xbox
description:
Play South of Midnight now with Early Access! 

Available April 8th on Xbox Series X|S and with Xbox Game Pass, Steam, and Windows PC.

Register here for a chance to visit Tom in person on April 5, 2025.
https://www.jeanlafitteswamptour.com/tours/index.htm 

Deep in the heart of the bayou, something stirs. Bigger than any gator you’ve ever seen, Two-Toed Tom is a legend of scales, survival, and insatiable hunger. More than double the size of the world’s biggest recorded alligator, Tom is an unstoppable force of nature.

To celebrate the launch of South of Midnight, Xbox has brought this monstrous gator to life in the gator-infested waters of Marrero, Louisiana, a location chosen for its haunting resemblance to the game’s Southern-inspired setting. 

Our recreation of Tom is truly startling – at 40 feet long, his jaws alone stand open at almost twice the height of a person, and inside his belly lies a 20-foot cabin, inspired by the very one that Hazel, the protagonist of South of Midn
title: South of Midnight Two-Toed Tom Gaming Houseboat

author: Xbox
description:
They say it’s not the destination—it’s the journey. And they’re right. Explore thousands of new worlds with Game Pass. Play brand new games on day one, like Indiana Jones and the Great Circle, South of Midnight, and Avowed. With titles added all the time, there’s always something for you to discover.

Download and explore a curated library of high-quality games and critically acclaimed indie titles like Eternal Strands, Towerborne, Clair Obscur: Expedition 33, and Fallout 76. Become a Game Pass member for one low monthly price and experience epic adventures across console, PC, and cloud.   

Join Game Pass today at https://www.xbox.com/xbox-game-pass

*Some content shown is not actual gameplay. Game catalog and features vary by plan, by region and over time. https://www.xbox.com/xbox-game-pass

title: Game Pass - It's the Journey

author: Xbox
description:
Spray Paint Simulator is coming to Xbox — available day one with Xbox Game Pass — May 2025!

In this relaxing, creativity-expressing sim, grab your spray tool, masking tools, and let the paint fly! 

Embark on a whimsical adventure in Story Mode as you meet with an eclectic group of clients, each in dire need of your painting expertise. 

Take on each job right from the start by prepping your space to ensure you deliver the best results, selecting the right colors for the task, and unleashing your creativity as you paint to perfection and keep your customers happy! Upgrade your tools, vehicles, and equipment, and use an assortment of ladders and scaffolding to help you get to those hard-to-reach spots. 

Fill the world with rainbow hues, painting everything from rooms and homes to cars and bridges and even giant robots! Unlock Free Spray mode to make the entire town your canvas and unlock the unlimited potential of your creative freedom! 

Spray Paint Simulator will be available on X
title: Spray Paint Simulator - Coming to Xbox and Xbox Game Pass

author: Xbox
description:
STARSEEKER is a new game set within the Astroneer universe with a focus on discovery, cooperative expeditions, and camaraderie.

 Exploring deep space on the ESS Starseeker, players will need to work together with the entire crew of the space station to complete planet- wide objectives across a multitude of star systems using cutting edge technology.

author: Xbox
description:
Play Now with Early Access.
Available April 8, 2025
 
South of Midnight is a new action-adventure from Compulsion Games. Learn an ancient weaving power, explore the Deep South mythos, and confront mysterious creatures in this folktale for modern times.

Unravel the Past in South of Midnight on Xbox Game Pass, Xbox Series XIS, Steam, and Windows PC.

https://www.xbox.com/games/south-of-midnight

author: Xbox
description:
Holstin is a survival horror set in 90s Poland, focused on investigation, combat, and mystery. 

Officially coming to Xbox.

It's late November 1992, and Poland is still in the early stages of its transformation following the fall of the Soviet Union. In the small, isolated town of Jeziorne-Kolonia, nestled in the eastern part of the country, a terrible calamity has struck, slowly consuming everyone and everything it touches. This is also the last known location of your close friend Bartek, before he stopped answering your calls. The mystery of his disappearance now compels you to follow in his footsteps, to uncover what brought him to this town in the first place

author: Xbox
description:
Autopsy Simulator sees players study realistic case files, created in collaboration with real-world forensic practitioners, to help guide their examinations and dissections.

Be kept on your toes with engrossing gameplay mechanics and spine-chilling moments in Story Mode. Or dial back the horror and step into the shoes of a student pathologist in Autopsy Only Mode.

Out Now on Xbox Series X|S
https://www.xbox.com/games/store/autopsy-simulator/9NW593XDJVLV
